document_data.name: Struthiomimus
document_data.mainbody: '''Struthiomimus''' ({{Pronounce|struth|ee|o|MY|mus|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|28}}}}) was a species of [[dinosaur]] distantly related to the [[deinonychus]]
document_data.Description: Struthiomimus was a type of ornithomisaur and looked somewhat like its distant cousin, the deinonychus. It resembled a large [[ostrich]] and had powerful legs. They had no teeth, instead eating with a sharp beak.
document_data.Behaviour: A struthiomimus was comparably less aggressive than its distant cousin, the deinonychus.
document_data.Habitat: Struthiomimus were most often encountered in areas with tall grass.
document_data.Ecology: Struthiomimuses were omnivorous and solitary creatures. While they rarely attacked large [[humans]], they were known to attack [[demihuman]]s and small [[humanoid]]s. In the Realms, they could be found in the land of [[Chult]].<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Something Weird is Going On in Late Uncle Rupert's Root Cellar|12}}
